function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of virucidal chemicals in disinfectant sprays due to their toxicity and adverse effects","Impact":"Health issues for skin and lungs, depending on concentration and duration of exposure","Mitigation":"Use of alternative non-toxic disinfectant sprays or technologies","Technologies":"Non-toxic disinfectant sprays, antimicrobial coatings","People":"Occupants of areas being disinfected","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, manufacturers of disinfectant products"},{"Description":"Corrosive nature and residue left by popular disinfectants (sodium hypochlorite and hypochlorous acid)","Impact":"Irritation to skin, throat, and eyes; not suitable for long-term use","Mitigation":"Development and use of non-corrosive disinfectants and cleaning methods","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, alternative disinfectants","People":"Cleaning staff, occupants of disinfected areas","Owner":"Public health departments, manufacturers of disinfectant products"},{"Description":"Antibacterial and antiviral surface coatings at high-risk areas in hospitals, schools, and public places","Impact":"Reduction in the spread of contagious diseases in high-risk areas","Mitigation":"Use of GBNs, metallic nanoparticles, and non-ionic polymeric materials for antiviral surface coatings","Technologies":"GBNs, metallic nanoparticles, non-ionic polymeric materials","People":"Occupants of high-risk areas, maintenance personnel","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare and education authorities"}]}
